content: Yin Zhang @ UTCS Yin Zhang (章寅) Associate Professor Department of Computer Science The University of Texas at Austin 2317 Speedway, Stop D9500 Austin, TX 78712-1757, USA Office: Gates 6.808 Campus mail: Computer Science D9500 Tel: +1 (512) 232-7496 (Office) Fax: +1 (512) 471-8885 E-mail: yzhang@cs.utexas.edu Curriculum Vitae (pdf) | Google Scholar Research | Papers | Talks | Patents | Teaching | Awards | Services | Miscellanea Welcome to my home page! I am an Associate Professor in the Department of Computer Science at The University of Texas at Austin. I received my Ph.D. in Computer Science from Cornell University in 2001. Between 2001-2004, I was a researcher at AT&T Labs-Research. Here is my Curriculum Vitae (pdf). Research My research interests span several areas of computer networks, including network management, network measurement, network security, wireless optimization, overlay routing and multihoming, and network algorithms. Previously I also worked on Web performance, congestion control, etc. Papers (or by subject) Talks Patents Google Scholar Selected Publications ViceROI: Catching Click-Spam in Search Ad Networks (CCS 2013) (Coming soon!)
